title: Cant log in to support. Help me get my old "my Store" skin pls
body: I had blood moon jhin in the old store before the reset and i want it QQ I read that support could help me get it?

replies.body:
i can help you with this!  :D  Here are the items from your first set:

• Championship Thresh - 50% - Discount Price: 487 RP				
• Riot Blitzcrank - 40% - Discount Price: 585 RP				
• TPA Ezreal - 50% - Discount Price: 375 RP				
• Blood Moon Jhin - 40% - Discount Price: 810 RP				
• Pickpocket Twitch - 40% - Discount Price: 450 RP				
• Rocket Girl Tristana - 60% - Discount Price: 390 RP				

Make sure you have enough RP on your account, and let me know which ones you wanted to grab.  I'll manually process it for you.
Championship Thresh Pls. Im like 200 RP shy of Blood Moon Feelsbadman
